site.name: ***Note***
site.about: Please confirm the writeup from your respected teachers before you write them.

site.name: Group A 1
site.about: DBMS using connections(Client-Data sever, two tier) Oracle/MySQL (ODBC/JDBC), SQL prompt to create data base tables insert, update data values, delete table, use table, select queries with/without where clause. ,demonstrate use of stored procedure / function (create procedure at the data side and make use of it on the client side)

site.name: Group A 2
site.about: DBMS using connections(Client-application server-Data sever, three tier) Oracle/MySQL (ODBC/JDBC), SQL Joints, prompt.

site.name: Group A 3
site.about: Design and Develop SQL DDL statements which demonstrate the use of SQL objects such as Table, View , Index using Client-Data sever(two tier).

site.name: Group A 4
site.about: Write a program in Python/C++ to read display the i-node information for a given text file, image file.

site.name: Group A 5
site.about: Write an IPC program using pipe. Process A accepts a character string and Process B inverses the string. Pipe is used to establish communication between A and B processes using Python or C++.

site.name: Group A 6
site.about: Use Python for Socket Programming to connect two or more PCs to share a text file.

site.name: Group B 11
site.about: Write a python program for creating virtual file system on Linux environment.

site.name: Group B 12
site.about: Write a program in C++ to make USB Device Bootable by installing required system files

site.name: Group B 13
site.about: Write a program in python for USB Device File Management. Check usefulness of command e2fsck for different file systems mounted on computer.

site.name: Group B 14
site.about: Aggregation and indexing with suitable example using Cassendra and RdfID based employees attendance system.

site.name: Group B 15
site.about: Aggregation and indexing with suitable example using MongoDB.

site.name: Group B 16
site.about: Map reduce operation with suitable example using MongoDB.
